subject: UBA Group Bank
body:
UBA Group Bank
Carrefour des trios Banques Avenue Pape Jean Paul II, Cotonou
Remittance Director: Ngari Peter
Contact Tel: +229 69631676
Email:ubaremittancedepartmentu@gmail.com
Attention Beneficiary.
We have been mandated to inform you of your pending unclaimed fund
amounting to the sum of ($12,500.000USD) in our Bank and also to bring
to your notice that all unpaid fund has been directed by the United
Nation/International Monetary Fund to dispatch to the various
beneficiaries including you with immediate effect due to the ongoing
pandemic saga. 
You are advised to get back to us now with your details
for fast processing and transfer of your fund as directed.
Congratulations and waiting to hear back from you
Thanks for your Co-operation and we looking forward to hear from you.
Nancy yuna
From UBA Group Bank
ubaremittancedepartmentu@gmail.com

subject: Re: UBA Group Bank
body:
Hello Nancy,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the pending unclaimed fund. I appreciate you bringing this to my attention. Can you please provide me with more details about the fund? Specifically, I would like to know the amount and any relevant information about its origin.

Additionally, could you clarify how the ongoing pandemic saga is related to the dispatch of unpaid funds? I'm curious to understand the connection between these two factors.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Tanesha
